name: Highway 35
description:
Your car lost control and is speeding down the highway. How far can you make it? Post your highscores in the comments!

The car model was specifically made for and during this game jam, while the track was pre-made.

Link to source code: https://github.com/Ingmar-van-Busschbach/GMTKJam2020

This project is made in Unreal Engine, heavily relying on the built-in capabilities of the engine. The vehicle movement is handled by the engine, for example. No code had to be writting to have that functionality other than hooking up input.

The entire project is written using visual code, containing less than 100 visual blueprint nodes, including animation blueprint, get/set nodes, etc.
